prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon with bright yellow fur and adorable features.
Imagine a small, energetic Pokemon that loves to play in the grass.
Design a cute Pokemon with round cheeks and a lightning bolt tail.
Show me a playful creature that embodies the spirit of electricity and joy.
Give me a Pokemon that sparks joy and has a cheerful personality.
Generate a character that is always ready for an adventure with its trainer.
Make a visual of a tiny, yellow Pokemon that can generate electricity.

distinctive_features: Long tail with a lightning bolt tip
